    • Uses of Chromosome in operators

      Methods in operators that return Chromosome 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Chromosome CrossoverOperators.cyclic(Chromosome parent1, Chromosome parent2)
      Creates one child from two parents applying the CrossOver algorithm for genetic mating of chromosomes. The detailed argorithm is found at http://www-public.int-evry.fr/~gibson/Teaching/CSC4504/L5-GeneticAlgorithms.pdf
      static Chromosome MutationOperators.inversion(Chromosome chromosome)
      Creates new randomly mutated chromosome from its parent.
      Methods in operators with parameters of type Chromosome 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Chromosome CrossoverOperators.cyclic(Chromosome parent1, Chromosome parent2)
      Creates one child from two parents applying the CrossOver algorithm for genetic mating of chromosomes. The detailed argorithm is found at http://www-public.int-evry.fr/~gibson/Teaching/CSC4504/L5-GeneticAlgorithms.pdf
      static void Heuristic.heuristics2opt(Chromosome chromosome, IGraph g)
      Creates childs as heuristics optimalizations of chromosome
      the algorithm is described at described at http://www.gcd.org/sengoku/docs/arob98.pdf and used at http://www.zlote.jabluszko.net/tsp/ The modification is made to apply for design and code in this project
      After muting or crossing, calling heuristic to create new generation
      static Chromosome MutationOperators.inversion(Chromosome chromosome)
      Creates new randomly mutated chromosome from its parent.
      static void Heuristic.reverse(Chromosome chromosome, int startIndex, int stopIndex)
      Part of heuristics optimalizations of chromosome taken from code at http://www.zlote.jabluszko.net/tsp/
